article.title: STG to Support Enterprise IT
article.text: STG Inc., Reston, Virginia, was awarded a $14,999,951 modification (1Q01) to contract W91QUZ-06-D-0015 for Enterprise Information Technology Service Support for the Army Test and Evaluation Command, Aberdeen Proving Grounds, Maryland. Funding and work location will be determined with each order. Estimated completion date is February 29, 2016. The Army Contracting Command, Fort Hood, Texas, is the contracting activity.
